text: nissandeh maheenon kee sankhya - allaah ke adhyaadesh mein us din se jab usane aakaashon aur dharatee ko paida kiya - allaah kee drshti mein baarah maheene hai. unamen chaar aadar ke hai, yahee seedha deen (dharm) hai. atah tum un (maheenon) mein apane oopar atyaachaar na karo. aur musharikon se tum sabake sab lado, jis prakaar ve sab milakar tumase ladate hai. aur jaan lo ki allaah dar rakhanevaalon ke saath hai
